AcceptInquiredSystemEvent.title: AcceptInquiredSystemEvent
AcceptInquiredSystemEvent.summary: Accepts the default operation for a system event in the Inquiring state and authorizes the system to perform the default operation.

AddTags.title: AddTags
AddTags.summary: Adds tags to Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resources, or overwrites tags of ECS resources. You can add tags to ECS resources such as instances, disks, snapshots, images, and security groups for easy management.

AllocateDedicatedHosts.title: AllocateDedicatedHosts
AllocateDedicatedHosts.summary: Creates pay-as-you-go or subscription dedicated hosts. A dedicated host is a physical server dedicated to a single tenant. You can create Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances on a dedicated host and view the attributes of a dedicated host.

AllocatePublicIpAddress.title: AllocatePublicIpAddress
AllocatePublicIpAddress.summary: Assigns a public IP address to an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ApplyAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: ApplyAutoSnapshotPolicy
ApplyAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: Applies an automatic snapshot policy to one or more disks. You can call this operation to replace the automatic snapshot policy of a disk.

AssignIpv6Addresses.title: AssignIpv6Addresses
AssignIpv6Addresses.summary: Assigns one or more IPv6 addresses to an elastic network interface (ENI).

AssignPrivateIpAddresses.title: AssignPrivateIpAddresses
AssignPrivateIpAddresses.summary: Assigns one or more secondary private IP addresses to an elastic network interface (ENI). You can specify available private IP addresses within the CIDR block of the vSwitch that hosts the ENI. Alternatively, you can specify the number of private IP addresses for Elastic Compute Service (ECS) to automatically assign them.

AttachClassicLinkVpc.title: AttachClassicLinkVpc
AttachClassicLinkVpc.summary: Links an instance that is deployed in the classic network to a virtual private cloud (VPC) by establishing a ClassicLink connection between the instance and the VPC. This way, the instance can communicate with cloud resources in the VPC over the internal network.

AttachDisk.title: AttachDisk
AttachDisk.summary: Attaches a pay-as-you-go data disk or a system disk to an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. The instance and the disk must reside in the same zone.

AttachInstanceRamRole.title: AttachInstanceRamRole
AttachInstanceRamRole.summary: Attaches an instance Resource Access Management (RAM) role to one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. An instance can have only a single instance RAM role. If an instance already has an instance RAM role, an error is returned when you attach another instance RAM role to the instance.

AttachKeyPair.title: AttachKeyPair
AttachKeyPair.summary: Binds an SSH key pair to one or more Linux instances.

AttachNetworkInterface.title: AttachNetworkInterface
AttachNetworkInterface.summary: Attaches an elastic network interface (ENI) to an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that resides in a virtual private cloud (VPC).

AuthorizeSecurityGroup.title: AuthorizeSecurityGroup
AuthorizeSecurityGroup.summary: Creates inbound rules in a security group. You can use the created rules to allow or deny inbound traffic from other hosts to instances in the security group.

AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress.title: AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress
AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress.summary: Creates outbound rules in a security group. You can use the created rules to allow or deny outbound traffic from instances in the security group to other objects.

CancelAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: CancelAutoSnapshotPolicy
CancelAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: Disables automatic snapshot policies for one or more disks.

CancelCopyImage.title: CancelCopyImage
CancelCopyImage.summary: Cancels an ongoing image copy task.

CancelImagePipelineExecution.title: CancelImagePipelineExecution
CancelImagePipelineExecution.summary: You can call this operation to cancel an image build task.

CancelSimulatedSystemEvents.title: CancelSimulatedSystemEvents
CancelSimulatedSystemEvents.summary: Cancels simulated system events that are in the Scheduled or Executing state. After you cancel a simulated system event, the simulated event enters the Canceled state.

CancelTask.title: CancelTask
CancelTask.summary: Cancels a running task. You can cancel the running tasks generated by the ImportImage or ExportImage operation.

ConvertNatPublicIpToEip.title: ConvertNatPublicIpToEip
ConvertNatPublicIpToEip.summary: Converts the public IP address of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance located in a virtual private cloud (VPC) into an elastic IP address (EIP).

CopyImage.title: CopyImage
CopyImage.summary: Copies a custom image from one region to another. You can deploy or copy Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances across regions by copying custom images.

CopySnapshot.title: CopySnapshot
CopySnapshot.summary: Copies a normal snapshot from one region to another.

CreateActivation.title: CreateActivation
CreateActivation.summary: Creates an activation code. The activation code is used to register servers that are not provided by Alibaba Cloud as Alibaba Cloud managed instances.

CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy
CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: Creates an automatic snapshot policy within a specific region. Automatic snapshot policies allow Elastic Compute Service (ECS) to create snapshots for a disk on a regular basis to back up data. These policies can be applied to both system disks and data disks.

CreateDedicatedHostCluster.title: CreateDedicatedHostCluster
CreateDedicatedHostCluster.summary: You can call this operation to create a dedicated host cluster.

CreateDemand.title: CreateDemand
CreateDemand.summary: Creates a demand for Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resources.

CreateDeploymentSet.title: CreateDeploymentSet
CreateDeploymentSet.summary: Creates a deployment set in a specific region.

CreateDiagnosticMetricSet.title: CreateDiagnosticMetricSet
CreateDiagnosticMetricSet.summary: Creates a diagnostic metric set. You can group diagnostic metrics into diagnostic metric sets.

CreateDiagnosticReport.title: CreateDiagnosticReport
CreateDiagnosticReport.summary: Creates a diagnostic report for a resource.

CreateDisk.title: CreateDisk
CreateDisk.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go or subscription data disk.

CreateHpcCluster.title: CreateHpcCluster
CreateHpcCluster.summary: Creates a high performance computing (HPC) cluster.

CreateImage.title: CreateImage
CreateImage.summary: Creates a custom image. After you call this operation to create a custom image, you can call the RunInstances operation to create Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances from the created custom image or call the ReplaceSystemDisk operation to replace system disks by using the custom image.

CreateImageComponent.title: CreateImageComponent
CreateImageComponent.summary: Creates an image component. Image components are used to store the image template commands that are commonly used to create images.

CreateImagePipeline.title: CreateImagePipeline
CreateImagePipeline.summary: Creates an image template. Image templates can be used to create images.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates a subscription or pay-as-you-go Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

CreateKeyPair.title: CreateKeyPair
CreateKeyPair.summary: Creates an SSH key pair. The system stores the public key and returns the unencrypted private key. The private key is encoded with PEM in the PKCS#8 format. You are responsible for storing the private key and ensuring its confidentiality.

CreateLaunchTemplate.title: CreateLaunchTemplate
CreateLaunchTemplate.summary: Creates a launch template. A launch template eliminates the need to configure a large number of parameters every time you create an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

CreateLaunchTemplateVersion.title: CreateLaunchTemplateVersion
CreateLaunchTemplateVersion.summary: Creates a version for a launch template.

CreateNetworkInterfacePermission.title: CreateNetworkInterfacePermission
CreateNetworkInterfacePermission.summary: Grants a permission on an elastic network interface (ENI) to an Alibaba Cloud partner (a certified ISV) or an individual user.

CreateSecurityGroup.title: CreateSecurityGroup
CreateSecurityGroup.summary: Creates a security group. By default, a security group allows only instances in the security group to access each other. Access requests from outside the security group are denied. If you want to allow requests over the Internet or from instances in other security groups, you can call the AuthorizeSecurityGroup operation.

CreateSimulatedSystemEvents.title: CreateSimulatedSystemEvents
CreateSimulatedSystemEvents.summary: Schedules simulated system events for one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. The simulated system events do not actually occur on or affect ECS instances.

CreateSnapshot.title: CreateSnapshot
CreateSnapshot.summary: Creates a snapshot for a disk.

CreateSnapshotGroup.title: CreateSnapshotGroup
CreateSnapshotGroup.summary: Creates a snapshot-consistent group for the cloud disks of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. A snapshot-consistent group contains snapshots of one or more cloud disks.

CreateStorageSet.title: CreateStorageSet
CreateStorageSet.summary: (Beta) Creates a storage set in a zone of a region.

DeleteAutoProvisioningGroup.title: DeleteAutoProvisioningGroup
DeleteAutoProvisioningGroup.summary: You can call this operation to delete an auto provisioning group.

DeleteAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: DeleteAutoSnapshotPolicy
DeleteAutoSnapshotPolicy.summary: You can call this operation to delete an automatic snapshot policy. After you delete an automatic snapshot policy, the policy will no longer be applied to the disks that it previously took effect on.

DeleteDedicatedHostCluster.title: DeleteDedicatedHostCluster
DeleteDedicatedHostCluster.summary: You can call this operation to delete a dedicated host cluster.

DeleteDemand.title: DeleteDemand
DeleteDemand.summary: You can call this operation to delete requirement filing information of ECS resources. This operation allows you to delete the resource requirement information that you submitted.

DeleteDeploymentSet.title: DeleteDeploymentSet
DeleteDeploymentSet.summary: You can call this operation to delete a deployment set.

DeleteDisk.title: DeleteDisk
DeleteDisk.summary: Releases a pay-as-you-go data disk. The data disk can be a basic disk, an ultra disk, a standard SSD, or an enhanced SSD (ESSD).

DeleteHpcCluster.title: DeleteHpcCluster
DeleteHpcCluster.summary: You can call this operation to delete an HPC cluster.

DeleteInstance.title: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.summary: Releases a pay-as-you-go ECS instance or an expired subscription ECS instance.

DeleteInstances.title: DeleteInstances
DeleteInstances.summary: Releases pay-as-you-go instances or expired subscription instances.

DeleteKeyPairs.title: DeleteKeyPairs
DeleteKeyPairs.summary: Deletes one or more SSH key pairs.

DeleteLaunchTemplateVersion.title: DeleteLaunchTemplateVersion
DeleteLaunchTemplateVersion.summary: Deletes a version of an instance launch template. This operation cannot delete the default version of an instance launch template. To delete the default version, you must call the DeleteLaunchTemplate operation to delete the instance launch template and all of its versions.

DeletePrefixList.title: DeletePrefixList
DeletePrefixList.summary: Deletes a prefix list and all entries in the prefix list.

DeleteSnapshot.title: DeleteSnapshot
DeleteSnapshot.summary: Deletes a snapshot. If you call this operation to delete a snapshot that is being created, the snapshot creation task is canceled.

DeleteStorageSet.title: DeleteStorageSet
DeleteStorageSet.summary: (Beta) Deletes an empty storage set. The storage set that you want to delete must be empty and do not contain disks or Shared Block Storage devices.

DeregisterManagedInstance.title: DeregisterManagedInstance
DeregisterManagedInstance.summary: Deregisters a managed instance. After you deregister the managed instance, you can no longer use Cloud Assistant to send commands or files to the instance.

DescribeAccountAttributes.title: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.summary: Queries the quotas of Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resources that you can create in an Alibaba Cloud region. For a specific region, you can query the maximum numbers of security groups, elastic network interfaces (ENIs), vCPUs for pay-as-you-go instances, vCPUs for preemptible instances, the capacity quotas for pay-as-you-go disks that you can create and the number of dedicated hosts that you can create. You can also query information such as network types or whether an account has completed real-name verification.

DescribeActivations.title: DescribeActivations
DescribeActivations.summary: Queries existing activation codes and their usage information.

DescribeAutoProvisioningGroupHistory.title: DescribeAutoProvisioningGroupHistory
DescribeAutoProvisioningGroupHistory.summary: Queries the scheduling tasks of an auto provisioning group.

DescribeAutoProvisioningGroupInstances.title: DescribeAutoProvisioningGroupInstances
DescribeAutoProvisioningGroupInstances.summary: You can call this operation to query instances in an auto provisioning group.

DescribeAutoProvisioningGroups.title: DescribeAutoProvisioningGroups
DescribeAutoProvisioningGroups.summary: Queries information of auto provisioning groups.

DescribeAutoSnapshotPolicyEx.title: DescribeAutoSnapshotPolicyEx
DescribeAutoSnapshotPolicyEx.summary: Queries existing automatic snapshot policies in a region.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the availability of resources in a zone. You can call this operation before you create or modify instances to ensure that sufficient resources are available.

DescribeBandwidthLimitation.title: DescribeBandwidthLimitation
DescribeBandwidthLimitation.summary: You can call this operation to query the maximum public bandwidth that can be purchased, upgraded, or downgraded for various instance types.

DescribeCapacityReservationInstances.title: DescribeCapacityReservationInstances
DescribeCapacityReservationInstances.summary: Queries the instances that match a capacity reservation.

DescribeCapacityReservations.title: DescribeCapacityReservations
DescribeCapacityReservations.summary: Queries the details of capacity reservations.

DescribeClassicLinkInstances.title: DescribeClassicLinkInstances
DescribeClassicLinkInstances.summary: Queries Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that reside in the classic network and have established ClassicLink connections with virtual private clouds (VPCs).

DescribeCloudAssistantStatus.title: DescribeCloudAssistantStatus
DescribeCloudAssistantStatus.summary: Queries whether Cloud Assistant Agent is installed on Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. If Cloud Assistant Agent is installed, the system queries the total number of Cloud Assistant commands that have been run, the number of Cloud Assistant commands that are being run, and the time when Cloud Assistant commands were last run.

DescribeCommands.title: DescribeCommands
DescribeCommands.summary: Queries the Cloud Assistant commands that you created or the common Cloud Assistant commands that Alibaba Cloud provides.

DescribeDedicatedHostAutoRenew.title: DescribeDedicatedHostAutoRenew
DescribeDedicatedHostAutoRenew.summary: Queries the auto-renewal states of one or more subscription dedicated hosts.

DescribeDedicatedHostClusters.title: DescribeDedicatedHostClusters
DescribeDedicatedHostClusters.summary: Queries the details of one or more dedicated host clusters.

DescribeDedicatedHostTypes.title: DescribeDedicatedHostTypes
DescribeDedicatedHostTypes.summary: You can call this operation to query the details about dedicated host types supported in a region, or the ECS instance families supported by a specific dedicated host type.

DescribeDedicatedHosts.title: DescribeDedicatedHosts
DescribeDedicatedHosts.summary: Queries the information about dedicated hosts, including the physical performance specifications, machine codes, and service states of the dedicated hosts, and Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that are created on the dedicated hosts.

DescribeDemands.title: DescribeDemands
DescribeDemands.summary: Queries the delivery and usage states of filed resources.

DescribeDeploymentSetSupportedInstanceTy.title: DescribeDeploymentSetSupportedInstanceTypeFamily
DescribeDeploymentSetSupportedInstanceTy.summary: Queries the instance families that support deployment sets.

DescribeDeploymentSets.title: DescribeDeploymentSets
DescribeDeploymentSets.summary: Queries the attributes of one or more deployment sets.

DescribeDiagnosticReportAttributes.title: DescribeDiagnosticReportAttributes
DescribeDiagnosticReportAttributes.summary: Queries the details of a diagnostic report.

DescribeDiskMonitorData.title: DescribeDiskMonitorData
DescribeDiskMonitorData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of a disk in a specific period of time.

DescribeDisks.title: DescribeDisks
DescribeDisks.summary: Queries one or more block storage devices that you created, including cloud disks and local disks.

DescribeDisksFullStatus.title: DescribeDisksFullStatus
DescribeDisksFullStatus.summary: Queries the full status information about one or more Elastic Block Storage (EBS) devices.

DescribeElasticityAssuranceInstances.title: DescribeElasticityAssuranceInstances
DescribeElasticityAssuranceInstances.summary: Queries the running Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that match and use the elasticity assurance service.

DescribeElasticityAssurances.title: DescribeElasticityAssurances
DescribeElasticityAssurances.summary: Queries the details of elasticity assurances.

DescribeEniMonitorData.title: DescribeEniMonitorData
DescribeEniMonitorData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of a secondary elastic network interface (ENI) over a specific period of time.

DescribeHpcClusters.title: DescribeHpcClusters
DescribeHpcClusters.summary: Queries available high performance computing (HPC) clusters. You can specify multiple request parameters to be queried. Specified parameters have logical AND relations and are included in the filter conditions. The request parameters are not dependent on each other.

DescribeImageComponents.title: DescribeImageComponents
DescribeImageComponents.summary: Queries the details of one or more image components.

DescribeImageFromFamily.title: DescribeImageFromFamily
DescribeImageFromFamily.summary: You can call this operation to query available custom images that are newly created in a specific image family.

DescribeImagePipelineExecutions.title: DescribeImagePipelineExecutions
DescribeImagePipelineExecutions.summary: Queries the details of an image creation task.

DescribeImagePipelines.title: DescribeImagePipelines
DescribeImagePipelines.summary: Queries the details of one or more image templates.

DescribeImageSharePermission.title: DescribeImageSharePermission
DescribeImageSharePermission.summary: You can call this operation to query the accounts to which a custom image is shared. The response can be displayed by page. By default, ten entries are displayed on each page.

DescribeImageSupportInstanceTypes.title: DescribeImageSupportInstanceTypes
DescribeImageSupportInstanceTypes.summary: Queries the instance types supported by an image.

DescribeInstanceAttachmentAttributes.title: DescribeInstanceAttachmentAttributes
DescribeInstanceAttachmentAttributes.summary: Queries the information about the private pools that Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances match.

DescribeInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAttribute
DescribeInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an instance by instance ID.

DescribeInstanceAutoRenewAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAutoRenewAttribute
DescribeInstanceAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Queries the auto-renewal status of subscription Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

DescribeInstanceHistoryEvents.title: DescribeInstanceHistoryEvents
DescribeInstanceHistoryEvents.summary: Queries historical system events that are inactive.

DescribeInstanceMaintenanceAttributes.title: DescribeInstanceMaintenanceAttributes
DescribeInstanceMaintenanceAttributes.summary: Queries the maintenance attributes of an instance.

DescribeInstanceModificationPrice.title: DescribeInstanceModificationPrice
DescribeInstanceModificationPrice.summary: Queries the pricing information about newly attached subscription data disks or about the new instance types when you upgrade the configurations of unexpired subscription Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

DescribeInstanceMonitorData.title: DescribeInstanceMonitorData
DescribeInstanceMonitorData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. The monitoring data includes the vCPU utilization, CPU credits of the burstable instance, received data traffic, sent data traffic, and average bandwidth.

DescribeInstanceRamRole.title: DescribeInstanceRamRole
DescribeInstanceRamRole.summary: Queries the instance RAM roles that are attached to Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

DescribeInstanceStatus.title: DescribeInstanceStatus
DescribeInstanceStatus.summary: Queries the status information of multiple Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

DescribeInstanceTopology.title: DescribeInstanceTopology
DescribeInstanceTopology.summary: Queries the topology of the host on which an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance resides.

DescribeInstanceTypeFamilies.title: DescribeInstanceTypeFamilies
DescribeInstanceTypeFamilies.summary: You can call this operation to query the instance families provided by ECS.

DescribeInstanceTypes.title: DescribeInstanceTypes
DescribeInstanceTypes.summary: Queries the details of all instance types or a specific instance type provided by Elastic Compute Service (ECS).

DescribeInstanceVncUrl.title: DescribeInstanceVncUrl
DescribeInstanceVncUrl.summary: Queries the Virtual Network Computing (VNC) URL of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: Queries the details of one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

DescribeInstancesFullStatus.title: DescribeInstancesFullStatus
DescribeInstancesFullStatus.summary: Queries the full status information of Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. The full status information includes instance states and system event states. The instance states are the lifecycle states of instances. The system event states are the health states of maintenance events that occur on ECS instances.

DescribeInvocationResults.title: DescribeInvocationResults
DescribeInvocationResults.summary: Queries the execution results of one or more Cloud Assistant commands on Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

DescribeInvocations.title: DescribeInvocations
DescribeInvocations.summary: Queries the execution list and states of Cloud Assistant commands.

DescribeKeyPairs.title: DescribeKeyPairs
DescribeKeyPairs.summary: Queries one or more key pairs.

DescribeLaunchTemplateVersions.title: DescribeLaunchTemplateVersions
DescribeLaunchTemplateVersions.summary: Queries the versions of a launch template.

DescribeManagedInstances.title: DescribeManagedInstances
DescribeManagedInstances.summary: Queries a list of managed instances.

DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute.title: DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute
DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an elastic network interface (ENI).

DescribeNetworkInterfacePermissions.title: DescribeNetworkInterfacePermissions
DescribeNetworkInterfacePermissions.summary: Queries the elastic network interface (ENI)-related permissions that are granted to Alibaba Cloud partners who are certified ISVs or individual users.

DescribeNetworkInterfaces.title: DescribeNetworkInterfaces
DescribeNetworkInterfaces.summary: Queries the details of one or more elastic network interfaces (ENIs).

DescribePrefixListAssociations.title: DescribePrefixListAssociations
DescribePrefixListAssociations.summary: Queries the information of resources that are associated with a specific prefix list.

DescribePrefixListAttributes.title: DescribePrefixListAttributes
DescribePrefixListAttributes.summary: Queries the details of a prefix list, including the name, address family, maximum number of entries, and details of the entries.

DescribePrefixLists.title: DescribePrefixLists
DescribePrefixLists.summary: Queries the information of one or more prefix lists.

DescribePrice.title: DescribePrice
DescribePrice.summary: Queries the most recent prices of Elastic Compute Resource (ECS) resources.

DescribeRecommendInstanceType.title: DescribeRecommendInstanceType
DescribeRecommendInstanceType.summary: Queries alternative instance types for an instance type.

DescribeRenewalPrice.title: DescribeRenewalPrice
DescribeRenewalPrice.summary: Queries the renewal price of a subscription Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resource. Only the renewal prices of subscription resources can be queried.

DescribeReservedInstanceAutoRenewAttribu.title: DescribeReservedInstanceAutoRenewAttribute
DescribeReservedInstanceAutoRenewAttribu.summary: Queries the auto-renewal status of one or more subscription reserved instances.

DescribeResourceByTags.title: DescribeResourceByTags
DescribeResourceByTags.summary: You can call this operation to retrieve resources based on tags. You can also retrieve resources based on their types.

DescribeResourcesModification.title: DescribeResourcesModification
DescribeResourcesModification.summary: Queries available resources within a specific zone when you upgrade or downgrade instance types or replace system disks.

DescribeSecurityGroupAttribute.title: DescribeSecurityGroupAttribute
DescribeSecurityGroupAttribute.summary: Queries the rules of a security group.

DescribeSecurityGroupReferences.title: DescribeSecurityGroupReferences
DescribeSecurityGroupReferences.summary: Checks whether a security group is referenced by the rules of other security groups.

DescribeSecurityGroups.title: DescribeSecurityGroups
DescribeSecurityGroups.summary: Queries the basic information about security groups.

DescribeSendFileResults.title: DescribeSendFileResults
DescribeSendFileResults.summary: Queries the files sent by Cloud Assistant and their status.

DescribeSnapshotGroups.title: DescribeSnapshotGroups
DescribeSnapshotGroups.summary: Queries the information of one or more snapshot-consistent groups.

DescribeSnapshotLinks.title: DescribeSnapshotLinks
DescribeSnapshotLinks.summary: Queries the snapshot chains of one or more disks. A snapshot chain is a chain of all snapshots that are created for a disk. A disk corresponds to a snapshot chain.

DescribeSnapshotMonitorData.title: DescribeSnapshotMonitorData
DescribeSnapshotMonitorData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of snapshot sizes in a region within the last 30 days.

DescribeSnapshotPackage.title: DescribeSnapshotPackage
DescribeSnapshotPackage.summary: Queries purchased Object Storage Service (OSS) storage plans in a specified Alibaba Cloud region.

DescribeSnapshots.title: DescribeSnapshots
DescribeSnapshots.summary: Queries all the snapshots of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or a disk.

DescribeSnapshotsUsage.title: DescribeSnapshotsUsage
DescribeSnapshotsUsage.summary: You can call this operation to query the number of snapshots stored in a region and the total size of the snapshots.

DescribeSpotAdvice.title: DescribeSpotAdvice
DescribeSpotAdvice.summary: Queries information such as the average release rate of preemptible instances and the percentage of the average preemptible instance price relative to the pay-as-you-go instance price in the last 30 days, and real-time discounts of preemptible instances in a specified region.

DescribeSpotPriceHistory.title: DescribeSpotPriceHistory
DescribeSpotPriceHistory.summary: Queries the price history of a preemptible instance within the last 30 days.

DescribeStorageCapacityUnits.title: DescribeStorageCapacityUnits
DescribeStorageCapacityUnits.summary: Queries the details of one or more SCUs.

DescribeStorageSetDetails.title: DescribeStorageSetDetails
DescribeStorageSetDetails.summary: Queries the details of the disks or Shared Block Storage devices in a storage set.

DescribeStorageSets.title: DescribeStorageSets
DescribeStorageSets.summary: Describes the details of storage sets in a specific region. The details of a storage set include its region, zone, creation time, and maximum number of partitions.

DescribeTags.title: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.summary: Queries tags based on filter conditions. The filter conditions include the resources to which the tags are added, the IDs of the resources, the tag keys, and the tag values. Filter conditions have logical AND (&&) relations.

DescribeTaskAttribute.title: DescribeTaskAttribute
DescribeTaskAttribute.summary: You can call this operation to query the details of an asynchronous task. You can query the asynchronous tasks including importing images, exporting images, and modifying disk categories. The asynchronous tasks are generated by the ImportImage, ExportImage, and ModifyDiskSpec operations.

DescribeTasks.title: DescribeTasks
DescribeTasks.summary: Queries the progress of one or more asynchronous requests.

DescribeUserData.title: DescribeUserData
DescribeUserData.summary: Queries the user data of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: Queries the zones in a specific region.

DetachClassicLinkVpc.title: DetachClassicLinkVpc
DetachClassicLinkVpc.summary: You can call this operation to unlink a classic network-type instance from a virtual private cloud (VPC) by removing the ClassicLink connection between them. After the instance is unlinked from the VPC, it can no longer communicate with instances in the VPC.

DetachDisk.title: DetachDisk
DetachDisk.summary: Detaches a pay-as-you-go data disk or a system disk from an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

DetachInstanceRamRole.title: DetachInstanceRamRole
DetachInstanceRamRole.summary: Detaches an instance RAM role from one or more ECS instances.

DetachKeyPair.title: DetachKeyPair
DetachKeyPair.summary: Unbinds an SSH key pair from one or more Linux instances.

DetachNetworkInterface.title: DetachNetworkInterface
DetachNetworkInterface.summary: Detaches an elastic network interface (ENI) from an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ExportImage.title: ExportImage
ExportImage.summary: Exports a custom image to an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket in the same region.

GetInstanceConsoleOutput.title: GetInstanceConsoleOutput
GetInstanceConsoleOutput.summary: Queries the command output of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. The returned command output is encoded in Base64.

GetInstanceScreenshot.title: GetInstanceScreenshot
GetInstanceScreenshot.summary: Obtains the screenshots of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ImportImage.title: ImportImage
ImportImage.summary: Imports an image to Elastic Compute Service (ECS).

ImportKeyPair.title: ImportKeyPair
ImportKeyPair.summary: Imports the public key of a Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA)-encrypted key pair that is generated by a third-party tool. After the public key of the key pair is imported, Alibaba Cloud stores the public key. You are responsible for storing the private key. We recommend that you store it in a safe place.

InstallCloudAssistant.title: InstallCloudAssistant
InstallCloudAssistant.summary: Installs the Cloud Assistant client on one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. After the Cloud Assistant client is installed on ECS instances, you must restart the instances for the Cloud Assistant client to take effect.

InvokeCommand.title: InvokeCommand
InvokeCommand.summary: Triggers a Cloud Assistant command on one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

JoinResourceGroup.title: JoinResourceGroup
JoinResourceGroup.summary: Adds an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resource or service to a resource group.

JoinSecurityGroup.title: JoinSecurityGroup
JoinSecurityGroup.summary: Adds an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or an elastic network interface (ENI) to a security group.

LeaveSecurityGroup.title: LeaveSecurityGroup
LeaveSecurityGroup.summary: Removes an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or an elastic network interface (ENI) from a security group.

ListPluginStatus.title: ListPluginStatus
ListPluginStatus.summary: Queries the states of Cloud Assistant plug-ins on Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resources.

ModifyAutoProvisioningGroup.title: ModifyAutoProvisioningGroup
ModifyAutoProvisioningGroup.summary: Modifies the configurations of an auto-provisioning group.

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyEx.title: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyEx
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyEx.summary: Modifies an automatic snapshot policy. After you modify an automatic snapshot policy that is applied to specific disks, the modified policy immediately takes effect on the disks.

ModifyCapacityReservation.title: ModifyCapacityReservation
ModifyCapacityReservation.summary: Modifies the information about a capacity reservation, including the name, description, release mode, and the total number of Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances for which capacity is reserved.

ModifyCommand.title: ModifyCommand
ModifyCommand.summary: Modifies the parameters and content of a Cloud Assistant command.

ModifyDedicatedHostAttribute.title: ModifyDedicatedHostAttribute
ModifyDedicatedHostAttribute.summary: Modifies some properties of a dedicated host, such as the name, description, and instance migration policy that is applied when the dedicated host fails.

ModifyDedicatedHostAutoReleaseTime.title: ModifyDedicatedHostAutoReleaseTime
ModifyDedicatedHostAutoReleaseTime.summary: Sets or cancels automatic release time for a pay-as-you-go dedicated host.

ModifyDedicatedHostAutoRenewAttribute.title: ModifyDedicatedHostAutoRenewAttribute
ModifyDedicatedHostAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Enables or disables auto-renewal for subscription dedicated hosts.

ModifyDedicatedHostClusterAttribute.title: ModifyDedicatedHostClusterAttribute
ModifyDedicatedHostClusterAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes of a dedicated host cluster, such as its name and description.

ModifyDedicatedHostsChargeType.title: ModifyDedicatedHostsChargeType
ModifyDedicatedHostsChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of dedicated hosts.

ModifyDemand.title: ModifyDemand
ModifyDemand.summary: Modifies the demand information of Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resources.

ModifyDeploymentSetAttribute.title: ModifyDeploymentSetAttribute
ModifyDeploymentSetAttribute.summary: You can call this operation to modify the name and description of a deployment set.

ModifyDiskAttribute.title: ModifyDiskAttribute
ModifyDiskAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes of one or more block storage devices (disks). The attributes include names, descriptions, and whether the attributes are released together with the associated instances.

ModifyDiskChargeType.title: ModifyDiskChargeType
ModifyDiskChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of disks that are attached to an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. The billing method of up to 16 disks that are attached to the instance can be changed by calling this operation.

ModifyDiskSpec.title: ModifyDiskSpec
ModifyDiskSpec.summary: You can call this operation to change the category of a disk or modify the performance level of an enhanced SSD (ESSD).

ModifyElasticityAssurance.title: ModifyElasticityAssurance
ModifyElasticityAssurance.summary: You can call this operation to modify the name and description of an elasticity assurance.

ModifyHpcClusterAttribute.title: ModifyHpcClusterAttribute
ModifyHpcClusterAttribute.summary: You can call this operation to modify the description of an Alibaba Cloud HPC (HPC) cluster.

ModifyImageAttribute.title: ModifyImageAttribute
ModifyImageAttribute.summary: Modifies the name, description, status, or image family of a custom image.

ModifyImageSharePermission.title: ModifyImageSharePermission
ModifyImageSharePermission.summary: Manages the sharing of a custom image.

ModifyInstanceAttachmentAttributes.title: ModifyInstanceAttachmentAttributes
ModifyInstanceAttachmentAttributes.summary: Modifies the attributes of the private pool of an instance.

ModifyInstanceAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAttribute
ModifyInstanceAttribute.summary: Modifies some attributes of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance, such as the password, name, description, hostname, security groups, and user data. If the instance is a burstable instance, you can also change its performance mode.

ModifyInstanceAutoReleaseTime.title: ModifyInstanceAutoReleaseTime
ModifyInstanceAutoReleaseTime.summary: Sets or cancels automatic release time for a pay-as-you-go Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. If you set the automatic release time for an instance, the instance is automatically released at the specified time. Proceed with caution when you perform this operation.

ModifyInstanceAutoRenewAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAutoRenewAttribute
ModifyInstanceAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Configures auto-renewal for one or more subscription instances. To reduce maintenance workloads after subscription instances expire, you can configure auto-renewal for the instances.

ModifyInstanceChargeType.title: ModifyInstanceChargeType
ModifyInstanceChargeType.summary: Changes the billing methods of instances between pay-as-you-go and subscription, or changes the billing method of all data disks that are attached to an instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

ModifyInstanceDeployment.title: ModifyInstanceDeployment
ModifyInstanceDeployment.summary: Changes the deployment set of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance or migrates an ECS instance to a dedicated host. When you migrate the ECS instance, you can change the instance type of the instance.

ModifyInstanceMaintenanceAttributes.title: ModifyInstanceMaintenanceAttributes
ModifyInstanceMaintenanceAttributes.summary: Modifies the maintenance attributes of an instance.

ModifyInstanceMetadataOptions.title: ModifyInstanceMetadataOptions
ModifyInstanceMetadataOptions.summary: Modifies the metadata of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ModifyInstanceNetworkSpec.title: ModifyInstanceNetworkSpec
ModifyInstanceNetworkSpec.summary: Modifies the bandwidth configurations of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. You can modify the bandwidth configurations of an instance to improve network performance.

ModifyInstanceSpec.title: ModifyInstanceSpec
ModifyInstanceSpec.summary: Changes the instance type and public bandwidth of a pay-as-you-go Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ModifyInstanceVncPasswd.title: ModifyInstanceVncPasswd
ModifyInstanceVncPasswd.summary: Modifies the Virtual Network Computing (VNC) password of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ModifyInstanceVpcAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceVpcAttribute
ModifyInstanceVpcAttribute.summary: Changes the virtual private cloud (VPC), private IP address, or vSwitch of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that resides in a VPC.

ModifyLaunchTemplateDefaultVersion.title: ModifyLaunchTemplateDefaultVersion
ModifyLaunchTemplateDefaultVersion.summary: Changes the default version of a launch template. If you do not specify a version number for a launch template when you create instances by calling the RunInstances operation, the default version of the launch template is used.

ModifyManagedInstance.title: ModifyManagedInstance
ModifyManagedInstance.summary: Modifies the information about a managed instance.

ModifyNetworkInterfaceAttribute.title: ModifyNetworkInterfaceAttribute
ModifyNetworkInterfaceAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes, such as the name, description, and security group of an elastic network interface (ENI).

ModifyPrefixList.title: ModifyPrefixList
ModifyPrefixList.summary: Modifies the name, description, or entries of a specific prefix list.

ModifyPrepayInstanceSpec.title: ModifyPrepayInstanceSpec
ModifyPrepayInstanceSpec.summary: Upgrades or downgrades the instance type of a subscription instance. The new instance type takes effect for the remaining lifecycle of the instance.

ModifyReservedInstanceAttribute.title: ModifyReservedInstanceAttribute
ModifyReservedInstanceAttribute.summary: Modifies the attributes of a reserved instance, such as its name and description.

ModifyReservedInstanceAutoRenewAttribute.title: ModifyReservedInstanceAutoRenewAttribute
ModifyReservedInstanceAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Enables or disables auto-renewal for one or more reserved instances.

ModifyReservedInstances.title: ModifyReservedInstances
ModifyReservedInstances.summary: Splits, merges, or modifies reserved instances. You call this operation to modify the names and zones of reserved instances or change their instance types within the same instance family.

ModifySecurityGroupAttribute.title: ModifySecurityGroupAttribute
ModifySecurityGroupAttribute.summary: Modifies the name or description of a security group.

ModifySecurityGroupEgressRule.title: ModifySecurityGroupEgressRule
ModifySecurityGroupEgressRule.summary: Modifies the description of a security group rule. You can call this operation to modify only the description of a security group rule. If you want to modify other information, such as the policy, port range, and authorization object of the rule, log on to the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) console.

ModifySecurityGroupPolicy.title: ModifySecurityGroupPolicy
ModifySecurityGroupPolicy.summary: Modifies the internal access control policy of a basic security group. The internal access control policies of advanced security groups cannot be modified.

ModifySecurityGroupRule.title: ModifySecurityGroupRule
ModifySecurityGroupRule.summary: Modifies the description of a security group rule. You can call this operation to modify only the description of a security group rule. If you want to modify other information such as the policy, port range, and authorization object of the rule, log on to the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) console.

ModifySnapshotAttribute.title: ModifySnapshotAttribute
ModifySnapshotAttribute.summary: Modifies the name or description of a snapshot or disables the instant access feature.

ModifySnapshotGroup.title: ModifySnapshotGroup
ModifySnapshotGroup.summary: Modifies the name and description of a snapshot-consistent group.

ModifyStorageCapacityUnitAttribute.title: ModifyStorageCapacityUnitAttribute
ModifyStorageCapacityUnitAttribute.summary: Changes the name or modifies the description of a storage capacity unit (SCU).

ModifyStorageSetAttribute.title: ModifyStorageSetAttribute
ModifyStorageSetAttribute.summary: Modifies the name or description of a storage set.

PurchaseReservedInstancesOffering.title: PurchaseReservedInstancesOffering
PurchaseReservedInstancesOffering.summary: Purchases a reserved instance. Reserved instances can be automatically matched to pay-as-you-go instances to offset the fees of the pay-as-you-go instances.

PurchaseStorageCapacityUnit.title: PurchaseStorageCapacityUnit
PurchaseStorageCapacityUnit.summary: Purchases one or more storage capacity units (SCUs).

ReActivateInstances.title: ReActivateInstances
ReActivateInstances.summary: Reactivates a pay-as-you-go Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that has expired or has been recycled due to overdue payments.

ReInitDisk.title: ReInitDisk
ReInitDisk.summary: Re-initializes a disk to the state that it was in when it was created.

RebootInstance.title: RebootInstance
RebootInstance.summary: Restarts an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that is in the Running state.

RebootInstances.title: RebootInstances
RebootInstances.summary: Restarts Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. After this API operation is called, the ECS instances enter the Stopping state and then the Running state.

RedeployDedicatedHost.title: RedeployDedicatedHost
RedeployDedicatedHost.summary: Migrates Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances away from a failed dedicated host.

RedeployInstance.title: RedeployInstance
RedeployInstance.summary: Redeploys an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance when you receive an event notification for the instance.

RemoveTags.title: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.summary: Removes one or more tags from a resource such as an instance, disk, snapshot, image, or security group.

RenewDedicatedHosts.title: RenewDedicatedHosts
RenewDedicatedHosts.summary: Renews one or more subscription dedicated hosts.

RenewInstance.title: RenewInstance
RenewInstance.summary: Renews a subscription Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ReplaceSystemDisk.title: ReplaceSystemDisk
ReplaceSystemDisk.summary: Replaces the system disk or the operating system of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. After the system disk is replaced, the ID of the system disk changes and the original disk is released.

ReportInstancesStatus.title: ReportInstancesStatus
ReportInstancesStatus.summary: Reports the same exception on multiple Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances or on multiple disks of an ECS instance.

ResetDisk.title: ResetDisk
ResetDisk.summary: Rolls back a disk to a specific point in time based on a snapshot of the disk.

ResetDisks.title: ResetDisks
ResetDisks.summary: Rolls back one or more disks by using an instance snapshot.

ResizeDisk.title: ResizeDisk
ResizeDisk.summary: Resizes a system disk or data disk.

RevokeSecurityGroup.title: RevokeSecurityGroup
RevokeSecurityGroup.summary: Deletes inbound security group rules. After the rules are deleted, access control that is implemented based on the rules is removed.

RunCommand.title: RunCommand
RunCommand.summary: Runs a shell, PowerShell, or batch command on Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

RunInstances.title: RunInstances
RunInstances.summary: Creates one or more pay-as-you-go or subscription Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

SendFile.title: SendFile
SendFile.summary: Sends a file to one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

StartImagePipelineExecution.title: StartImagePipelineExecution
StartImagePipelineExecution.summary: Executes a pipeline task by using an image template.

StartInstance.title: StartInstance
StartInstance.summary: Starts an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. After the operation is called, the instance enters the Starting state.

StartInstances.title: StartInstances
StartInstances.summary: Starts Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that are in the Stopped state.

StartTerminalSession.title: StartTerminalSession
StartTerminalSession.summary: Creates a session by using the session management feature. When you call this operation, you can include the ID of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance in the request to create a WebSocket session for the instance. The URL of the WebSocket session returned by the operation can be used to connect to the instance.

StopInstance.title: StopInstance
StopInstance.summary: Stops an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance in the Running state. After the operation is called, the state of the instance changes to Stopping and then to Stopped.

StopInstances.title: StopInstances
StopInstances.summary: Stops Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. After the operation is called, the state of the instances changes to Stopping and then to Stopped.

StopInvocation.title: StopInvocation
StopInvocation.summary: Stops the process of a Cloud Assistant command that is running on one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to specified Elastic Compute Service (ECS) resources.

UnassignIpv6Addresses.title: UnassignIpv6Addresses
UnassignIpv6Addresses.summary: Unassign one or more IPv6 addresses from an elastic network interface (ENI).

UnassignPrivateIpAddresses.title: UnassignPrivateIpAddresses
UnassignPrivateIpAddresses.summary: Unassigns one or more secondary private IP addresses from an elastic network interface (ENI).
